ballester.gameworld.types

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ballester.gameworld.types.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Candy, LivingAgent

    public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    An agent is defined has:
    • a point in space
    • a vector of agent statistics
    • a state which can trigger a number of behaviours
    • a behavior tree
    • a character state
    Author:
    hugoz
